name: RabbleDabble
overview:
RabbleDabble.com is a Bay Area media company that aims to be the voice of the everyman. They cover what you want to say but are afraid to say. They donâ€™t hold back due to color line but cross it willingly and without fear of recourse. Mainstream media cannot speak objectively but rather reports in a politically correct manner, afraid to upset investors, the bottom-line and/or losing their jobs.

RabbleDabble.com is founded on the tenants of freedom of speech and fairness. Their founders are first generation Asian Americans who have been subject to bigotry themselves. Their writing staff is a proverbial Benetton Ad, hailing from all colors of the ethnic palette; Black, Asian, Native American, Jewish and Christian alike and as is the opinion of our founders, believe that the best action against passive intolerance is LOUD INTOLERACE.

We aim to identify racism, reverse racism, bigotry and prejudice tendencies in the world, even ourselves and our own people will be subjects.

White, Yellow, Black, Brown, Red, Christian, Jewish, Muslim, Atheist â€¦ we have no favorites and target no one in particular â€¦ their intent is to level the playing field!
